entry.tran: 技术专家官员;技术官僚
entry.def: A technocrat is a scientist, engineer, or other expert who is one of a group of similar people who have political power as well as technical knowledge.

means.word_mean: 1. an expert who is a member of a highly skilled elite group

auth_sentence.content: He wasn't an unfeeling technocrat, though.

auth_sentence.content: Geithner is, at heart, a technocrat rather than a politician.
